pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, November 11, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister and Sophie Gr√©goire Trudeau will participate in the National Remembrance Day Ceremony. Minister of Veterans Affairs and Associate Minister of National Defence Lawrence MacAulay will be in attendance.

National War Memorial

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for accredited media
  • Media should arrive no later than 10:00 a.m.
  • Accreditation from the Canadian Parliamentary Press Gallery is required. For more information, contact Pierre Cuguen at pierre.cuguen@parl.gc.ca.
